snippet: A businessman with a passion for Bruce Springsteen found a way to hold a Seder and still attend a concert at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Businessman Warren Rosen of Long Island finds a way to hold a Passover Seder and still attend a Bruce Springsteen concert by gathering 18 people in a private room at a restaurant on an upper level of Madison Square Garden for a pre-concert Seder.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and JOSEPH BERGER

lead_paragraph: A businessman with a passion for Bruce Springsteen found a way to hold a Seder and still attend a concert at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Celebrating Passover, and Bruce Springsteen, Too, at Madison Square Garden
headline.main: At the Garden, Spending Passover With Springsteen
headline.print_headline: At the Garden, Passover With Springsteen
